title: 25W: Are the Vols Still Being Disrespected Heading into Saturday? + Colin Cowherd on His Life & Career Journey + New Update on the Trip to Jerry's World + Dan Snyder's Billionaire Soap Opera
itunes:title: 25W: Are the Vols Still Being Disrespected Heading into Saturday? + Colin Cowherd on His Life & Career Journey + New Update on the Trip to Jerry's World + Dan Snyder's Billionaire Soap Opera
description:
Heading into Tennessee's big showdown with Alabama this weekend, are the Volunteers still being disrespected as big underdogs at home? Colin Cowherd joins Bobby to discuss his life and career journey to get him where he is today, including who instilled his work ethic and ability to dream big. Bobby gives an update about their trip to Dallas in December with a new twist in plans. Plus, with the latest drama in Washington, Bobby discusses the feud between the billionaire NFL owners. 

Download the DraftKings Sportsbook App today: https://dkng.co/bobbysports

Follow the Show: @25Whistles

Follow the Crew:

@MrBobbyBones

21+ (18+ WY). Physically present in AZ/CO/CT/IL/IN/IA/LA/MI/NJ/ NY/PA/TN/VA/WV/WY only. N/A in NH/OR/ON. New customers only. Valid 1 per new customer. Min. $5 deposit. Min $5 wager. $200 issued as eight (8) $25 free bets. Ends 9/19/22. See http://draftkings.com/sportsbook for details.
